column4: using netgear WG511T wireless card and only getting around 78% signal strength even though laptop is about 2 feet from router.
the critical question is, how quickly does it fall off as you move away
i get about 2 bars downstairs and in the bedroom, about 20-30 feet. havent hung out long enough to see if it totally gets dropped
also, it's much more important to assess throughput than those signal strength indicators
